org.apache.archiva.web.mapper
Class RepositoryActionMapper

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.struts2.dispatcher.mapper.DefaultActionMapper
      org.apache.archiva.web.mapper.RepositoryActionMapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.struts2.dispatcher.mapper.ActionMapper
public class RepositoryActionMapper
extends org.apache.struts2.dispatcher.mapper.DefaultActionMapper

Map alternate URLs to specific actions. Used for the repository browser and the proxy.
